trans-unit.source: 活动标题： 阳光普照：WXT全民大空投
trans-unit.target: Event Title: Sunshine: WXT National Airdrop

trans-unit.source: 活动参与方式：
trans-unit.target: How to participate:

trans-unit.source: 持有 <g id="1">200 WXT 以上</g> 即可参与瓜分千万 WXT 空投奖池！
trans-unit.target: Hold < g id = "1" > 200 WXT or more to participate in the 10 million WXT airdrop prize pool!

< g id = "1" > Airdrop Rules: < x id = "2"/> </g > < g id = "3" > First Airdrop </g > < g id = "4" > Time: 2025/2/15 24:00 (UTC +8) < x id = "5"/> Holding time < g id = "6" >: 2025/2/12 12:00 - 2025/2/1 </g > 5 < g id = "7" > 11 < g id = "8" >: </g > 59 < g id = "9" > (UTC +8), split by position proportion </g > < g id = "10" >: </g > < g id = "11" > $500,000 USDT equivalent WXT < x id = "12"/> Second Airdrop Time: 2025/2/22 24:00 (UTC +8) </g >
Holding time: 2/19/2025 12:00 - 2/22/2025 11:59 (UTC +8), divided by position ratio: $500,000 USDT equivalent WXT

trans-unit.source: 持仓计算规则：
trans-unit.target: Position Calculation Rules:

trans-unit.source: 为保证持仓的公平性，活动期间所有参与者的持仓需保持在活动门槛内（200 WXT 及以上），空投时将按用户在空投时间开始时的实际持仓状态，否则无法参与后续轮次的空投。
trans-unit.target: In order to ensure the fairness of the positioning, the positioning of all participants during the event must be kept within the activity threshold (200 WXT and above), and the airdrop will be based on the actual positioning status of the user at the beginning of the airdrop time, otherwise it will not be possible to participate in the airdrop in subsequent rounds.

trans-unit.source: 活动结束后，持仓若未满足门槛要求，将无法继续参与平台的相关权益。
trans-unit.target: After the event, if the position fails to meet the threshold requirements, it will not be able to continue to participate in the relevant rights and interests of the platform.

trans-unit.source: 持仓越多，瓜分越多！
trans-unit.target: The more positions you hold, the more you divide!

trans-unit.source: <g id="1">持有 ≥ 200 WXT：</g> 参与瓜分活动，按持仓比例分配空投奖励。
trans-unit.target: < g id = "1" > Hold ≥ 200 WXT: </g > Participate in the partition activity and distribute the airdrop reward according to the position proportion.

trans-unit.source: <g id="1">持有 ≥ 1,000 WXT：</g> 除参与本次空投外，还能参与每周热门币的瓜分活动。
trans-unit.target: < g id = "1" > Hold ≥ 1,000 WXT: </g > In addition to participating in this airdrop, you can also participate in the weekly popular currency split.

trans-unit.source: <g id="1">持有 ≥ 5,000 WXT：</g> 成为 VIP 用户，最高手续费 3 折和VIP专属大额空投等福利。
trans-unit.target: < g id = "1" > Hold ≥ 5,000 WXT: </g > Become a VIP user with up to 30% off fees and VIP exclusive large airdrops and other benefits.

trans-unit.source: 活动说明：
trans-unit.target: Activity description:

trans-unit.source: 1. 用户无需手动报名， 截止到空投开始时间，现货账户的最低持仓≥200 WXT即可获取活动参与资格，符合条件的用户将根据持仓比例瓜分每一轮WXT空投奖池；
trans-unit.target: 1. Users do not need to register manually. As of the airdrop start time, the minimum position in the spot account is ≥ 200 WXT to obtain the event participation qualification. Eligible users will be divided into each round of WXT airdrop prize pool according to the position proportion;

trans-unit.source: 2. 做市商、机构用户及子账户不能参与本次活动；
trans-unit.target: 2. Market makers, institutional users and sub-accounts cannot participate in this activity;

trans-unit.source: 3. 所有WXT空投奖励，将会在每一轮空投持有时间结束后发放至参与者的WEEX账号；
trans-unit.target: 3. All WXT airdrop rewards will be distributed to the participant's WEEX account after the end of each round of airdrop holding time;

trans-unit.source: 4<g id="1">. 若风险系统检测到用户存在串通行为，所有相关账户均将会被取消资格；</g>
trans-unit.target: 4 < g id = "1" >. If the risk system detects collusion by the user, all related accounts will be disqualified;

trans-unit.source: 5. 所有参与用户需严格遵守 WEEX 的服务条款，如发现用户存在批量注册、恶意刷量、作弊、非法、欺诈或其他有害目的的行为，WEEX 有权取消其参与资格及相关收益；
trans-unit.target: 5. All participating users are required to strictly abide by the terms of service of WEEX. If a user is found to have engaged in bulk registration, malicious flushing, cheating, illegal, fraudulent or other harmful purposes, WEEX has the right to disqualify him/her from participation and related benefits;

trans-unit.source: 6. WEEX 有权修改本次活动的条款，若有更改，恕不另行通知；
trans-unit.target: 6. WEEX reserves the right to amend the terms of this event without prior notice;

trans-unit.source: 7. WEEX 保留对本次活动条款与条件的最终解释权。
trans-unit.target: 7. WEEX reserves the right of final interpretation of the terms and conditions of this event.

trans-unit.source: 如有任何疑问，请联系客服团队。
trans-unit.target: If you have any questions, please contact our support team.
